metadata.title: Nestlé Connect Account Access & Retailer Refund Support

text: Nestlé Connect Account Access & Retailer Refund Support

If you are a retailer or business, access your account for returns of non-ice cream products, such as beverages, chocolates, infant nutrition and BOOST via Nestlé Connect. Simply login athttps://nestleconnect.ca/login.asp.
If you have trouble logging in, connect with our Customer Care team at 1-877-772-0012 to leave a message for callback or emailsupport@nestleconnect.ca
Note:Include account information in the email or voicemail.
To register for a new account, visitwww.nestleconnect.ca
Did you find this answer helpful?
Thank you for letting us know!
